title: Solving Systems of Equations in Word Problems
body: Julia and her husband own a coffee shop. They experimented with mixing a City Roast Columbian coffee that cost $$\$7.80$$ per pound with French Roast Columbian coffee that cost $$\$8.10$$ per pound to make a $$20$$ pound blend. Their blend should cost them $$\$7.92$$ per pound.
lesson: 5.5 Solve Mixture Applications with Systems of Equations
